ClientAttrReq.Description: CARML declaration for IDX User and Role entities

Attribute.Description: Name strings that are typically the suffix part of the person name (e.g. III, 3rd, Jr.)
Attribute.Name: generationqualifier

Attribute.Description: Accessibility mode - default, screenReader, inaccessible, etc.
Attribute.Name: accessibilitymode

Attribute.Description: Color contrast preference - standard, high, etc.
Attribute.Name: colorcontrast

Attribute.Description: Fond size preference - large, medium, etc.
Attribute.Name: fontsize

Attribute.Description: Embedded help preference - boolean value to turn on/off help popup
Attribute.Name: embeddedhelp

Attribute.Description: Fusion applications - preferred language for Display Name
Attribute.Name: fusiondisplaynamelangpref

Attribute.Description: Is Visible (for system/app id users/groups visible value is false)
Attribute.Name: visible

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsers

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsersbyPage

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given 'OR' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsersbyAnyAttr

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given 'OR' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsersbyAnyAttrbyPage

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given 'AND' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsersbyAllAttr

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Users matching given 'AND' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchUsersbyAllAttrbyPage

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRoles

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRolesbyPage

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given 'OR' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRolesbyAnyAttr

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given 'OR' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRolesbyAnyAttrbyPage

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given 'AND' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRolesbyAllAttr

SearchInteraction.Description: Returns all Roles matching given 'AND' filter condition
SearchInteraction.Name: searchRolesbyAllAttrbyPage
